forms.name: Short Form 3
forms.intro: This is the first form built purely from techniques. We focus on flow between techniques. Descriptions are brief—click any highlighted technique name for a full breakdown. Forms may alter or truncate techniques to emphasize full ranges of motion.

steps.text: From an attention stance, step forward into a right neutral bow while doing a left horizontal punch to the face and a right uppercut punch to the groin.
Left hand pins across your chest, then right inward block into a left outward block while moving into a right forward bow.
Left four-finger eye poke to attacker’s face, then left hand cocks back to your waist as you do a right horizontal thrust punch low.

Slide your right leg back into a cat stance as you bring both hands down in front of you (palms up); step forward into a right neutral bow while bringing hands up, flicking the eyes, then execute double thumb pokes to the eyes.
Step right side into horse stance while doing two downward elbows to the attacker’s forearms.
Left foot slides to your right, then shoots back to 7:30 into a right reverse bow (body facing 1:30, head facing 7:30).
Pivot left into a left neutral bow facing 7:30 while doing a left side elbow to the face with a right inward hammerfist to the solar plexus, ending in a left forward bow facing 7:30.
Slide your right foot to your left, then step back to 3:00 with your right foot, turning right into a right forward bow as you do a right outward block and left inward elbow.
As you step to 1:30 with your left foot into a left forward bow, pull your right arm across your body to pin the attacker’s hand on your neck.
Do a right downward elbow (clearing the arm from your neck), grab the attacker’s right arm with your right hand and pull in while doing a left two-finger eye poke.
Do a right upward elbow to the face and turn left into a left reverse bow while doing a right hammerfist to the groin.
Grab your right wrist with your left hand and settle into a transitional horse stance.
Step to 7:30 with your left foot into a horse stance (facing 10:30) and do a left outward elbow into a left overhead downward elbow.
Stand up as you slide your left foot toward your right while doing a back head-butt, shooting fists down in front of you and cocking your right foot (ball of foot up).
Right heel kick to attacker’s left shin (behind you), followed by a right side kick to attacker’s right shin (behind you), then stomp down on the foot.
Bring your right foot to your left into a left cat stance while hooking your hands out and back past your hips; simultaneously execute a forward head-butt.
As you step forward into a right neutral bow, execute double uppercuts to the solar plexus.
Pull arms back to chest (crossed—left on top), then strike out with crossed double back-knuckles to the face.
Pull arms back to chest (crossed—left on top), then extend into crossed double eye pokes (keep fingers even).
Step to 12:00 with your left foot and drag your right leg up into a left close kneel stance as you do a left inward hammerfist to the groin and a right inward hammerfist to the kidney.
Right hand tracks up the back, hooks the chin and anchors as you turn to 6:00 into a right forward bow and do a left heel-palm to the face; as you heel-palm, wrap your right arm around your back.
Counter-grab with your right hand, then execute an inverted step-through reverse (left leg steps back to 4:30 behind your right) with a left rear elbow to the face.
Left arm continues down to wrap the attacker’s right arm and shoots forward and down (palm up).
Bring your left fist up to your left shoulder (trapping the arm) as you step back with your right foot.
Release your right hand and bring it forward on top of the attacker’s head as you step through with a right knee strike to the face, landing to 10:30.
With both hands at your side, step to 10:30 with your left foot leading with both hands (pulling the attacker off balance).
Turn right while doing a right side elbow to the face into an overhead downward elbow to the spine.
Place both hands on the head and do a left knee to the face, planting back in your original position (horse stance facing 1:30).
With hands at your sides, your left hand pinches behind as your left foot stomps.
Right upward obscure elbow to the chin with a right scoop kick to the groin as your left arm and shoulder sink.
Right foot steps to the left of your left foot (in tight), then left foot steps around to the left of your right (turning 360° to end up beside the attacker).
With your left hand pinning the attacker’s arm to your chest, execute a right uppercut to break the elbow.
Pin the attacker’s left hand on your chest with your left hand and step to 12:00 with a right front ball kick, while executing a right inward hammering block that rises upward.
Right downward elbow to the bicep, right upward elbow to the chin, followed by a right downward heel-palm claw to the face.
Step back to 7:30 with your right foot with your right hand checking at face level as you deliver a left inward back-knuckle to the back of the head (toward your face).
Anchor your left elbow and execute a right half-fist (palm down) to the face.
Step counter-clockwise with your right foot to 3:00 into a horse stance facing 12:00 and move up to attention stance.

footerNotes: Short 3 is known as the elbow form.
Clock angles are all from your original position.
